token.description: Authentication token obtained from 'kubectl describe secret <secret_name>'

available_markets.description: A list of the countries in which the track can be played, identified by their ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 code.

artists.description: The artists who performed the track. Each artist object includes a link in href to more detailed information about the artist.

uri.description: The Spotify URI for the track.

offset.description: The index of the first item to return

is_playable.description: Part of the response when Track Relinking is applied. If true, the track is playable in the given market. Otherwise false.

href.description: A link to the Web API endpoint providing full details of the track.

external_urls.description: Known external URLs for this track.

track_number.description: The number of the track. If an album has several discs, the track number is the number on the specified disc.

id.description: The Spotify ID for the track.

market.description: The market (an ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code)

disc_number.description: The disc number (usually 1 unless the album consists of more than one disc).

explicit.description: Whether or not the track has explicit lyrics (true = yes it does; false = no it does not OR unknown).

limit.description: The maximum number of items to return

linked_from.description: Part of the response when Track Relinking is applied, and the requested track has been replaced with different track. The track in the linked_from object contains information about the originally requested track.

preview_url.description: A URL to a 30 second preview (MP3 format) of the track.
